long_description: The Pacsafe Metrosafe 350 GII keeps you well-organized with 5 anti-theft features. It's large enough to fit a 13 in. laptop and is an ideal companion that maneuvers well around busy city streets. RFID-reader-blocking pocket prevents access to your personal data stored on micro chips in your passport and credit cards. Features eXomesh(R) slashguards: lightweight stainless-steel wire mesh is built discreetly into the bottom and side panels, which are areas targeted by bag slashers. Flexible, lightweight stainless-steel wire is integrated into adjustable carry strap to prevent bag slashers from slicing through and running off with your gear. Shoulder strap has a releasable security hook at 1 end that allows the strap to be attached to a fixture so nobody can walk off with your bag. Large main zippered compartment with padded slip pocket; front zippered organizer pocket. Bright colored liner adds some fun and helps you easily locate what you need, when you need it; padded electronic pocket fits up to a 13 in. laptop or tablet. Padded back adds support and comfort. Rear zippered pocket with concealable zipper pull prevents a pickpocket from reaching into your bag. 2 water bottle/umbrella side pockets. Pacsafe Metrosafe 350 includes a pen holder and key clip.
short_description: The Pacsafe Metrosafe 350 GII keeps you well-organized with 5 anti-theft features. It's large enough to fit a 13 in. laptop and is an ideal companion that maneuvers well around busy city streets.
